name: The Graph Paper Game
description:
Test your skills against opponents in Online or Local multiplayer in this simple, charming strategy board game!

You have 8 points per turn to spend on units. Your turn ends when you run out of points to spend, or if you press the 'End Turn' button.

Capture enemy units to increase your score. The game ends when the board has no more available spaces, or when one player concedes.

You can set custom gameplay rules (points per turn, which units can be captured, how much each unit costs) on the Options page. Custom rules only work in Local play.

Controls:

- Scroll to zoom in or out

- Right click and drag to move the camera

- Left click to place your selected unit

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/wardensdev?fan_landing=true
